channel.title: Add a "marker size" setting to point maps markers
channel.description:
In order to enhance map visualization, would it be possible to set the size of shapes (at least squares) used to show point data ? This would be a great and easy way to visualize and generate regular grid maps. We should just need to get centroïd's coordinates in our query to show such a grid.
The best unit would be a meter size but DMS should work too.
![Capture d’écran du 2021-09-28 10-29-48|690x316](upload://aZb01521Wzmea5S2fGN4JSrXpPU.png)
